/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft light of a hazy sky. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urban charm to the scene. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the street, hinting at the daily life and movement that fills this urban landscape. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of brown and gray dominating, reflecting the city's blend of history and modernity. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image exudes a sense of vibrancy and energy, characteristic of a city that is always on the move.
